name: IfM Education and Consultancy Services
legal: Company owned by University of Cambridge
goal: To create positive societal benefit from the transfer of research-generated knowledge from the Institute for Manufacturing, Part of the Engineering Department at the University of Cambridge.  Transfer mechanisms include reports, papers, webinars, consultancy, training, education etc.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Energy, Regional Policy, Trade
euInitiatives: We currently do work funded by a number of European grants including the ACCESS project well as interventions with companies funded through the European Bank of Reconstruction and Development.  We do not have any specific initiatives, policies or legislative files though.  We are not a lobbying organisation
